title: Google Pay will soon improve its card ownership verification
content:
Google Pay will soon be improving its card ownership verification by way of one-time passcodes and in-line tokenization, in an effort to combat fraud. This comes after Google also announced that it would be introducing virtual cards for users on desktop and Android in the coming months. In the company’s “What’s new in Google Pay”

The post Google Pay will soon improve its card ownership verification appeared first on XDA.
description: Google Pay will soon improve its card ownership verification through inline tokenization and OTP checking in order to combat fraud.
